<h3 id="X38128">X(38128) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(8), X(11)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*(b+c)*a^6-7*(b+c)^2*a^5-(5*b-c)*(b-5*c)*(b+c)*a^4+2*(7*b^4+7*c^4-b*c*(b^2+18*b*c+c^2))*a^3-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(b^2+12*b*c+c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)^2*(7*b^2-16*b*c+7*c^2)*a+3*(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38128) = X(3)+2*X(3036) = X(8)+2*X(6713) = 4*X(10)-X(119) = 7*X(10)-X(21635) = X(11)+2*X(5690) = 2*X(80)+X(10993) = X(104)+5*X(3617) = 7*X(119)-4*X(21635) = 4*X(140)-X(1317) = 5*X(631)+X(12531) = X(1145)+2*X(12619) = 2*X(1145)+X(37726) = 2*X(18254)+X(37562) = 3*X(23513)-2*X(38038) = 3*X(23513)-4*X(38182) = 3*X(34122)-X(38038) = 3*X(34122)-2*X(38182) = 2*X(38032)-3*X(38069) = 3*X(38069)-4*X(38133) = 3*X(38099)-X(38156) = 3*X(38099)-2*X(38177)</b>
<p>X(38128) lies on these lines: {3,3036}, {8,6713}, {10,119}, {11,5690}, {30,38099}, {80,10993}, {100,6875}, {104,3617}, {140,1317}, {511,38192}, {515,38213}, {517,23513}, {518,38124}, {519,38032}, {528,38066}, {549,952}, {631,12531}, {936,6265}, {971,38211}, {1145,6734}, {1482,6667}, {1484,13996}, {1537,9956}, {1698,11729}, {2802,24386}, {2829,5790}, {3035,19914}, {3582,5844}, {3626,11715}, {3634,25485}, {3697,17654}, {4853,12737}, {5657,5840}, {5762,38202}, {5846,38119}, {5848,38116}, {5851,38121}, {5853,38131}, {5855,38135}, {5856,38126}, {6684,15863}, {6702,11362}, {6883,10087}, {7330,12515}, {7972,31423}, {8256,26470}, {9588,12119}, {9780,10698}, {9952,12738}, {10039,12832}, {10057,31515}, {11231,34123}, {12245,31272}, {12751,16209}, {18802,24390}, {19907,31235}, {28194,38161}, {28212,38141}, {28234,32557}</p>
<p>
X(38128) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (23513, 34122), (34123, 11231), (38032, 38133), (38038, 38182), (38156, 38177)<br>
X(38128) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1145, 12619, 37726), (26446, 38112, 38129), (34122, 38038, 38182), (38032, 38133, 38069), (38038, 38182, 23513), (38099, 38156, 38177)<br>
</p>
